author: Marnix van St. Aldegonde, Philips van, 1538-1598
title: Ad potentissimos ac serenissimos reges, principes, reliquosqueue amplissimos christiani orbis ordines Seria de reip. christianae statu ejusqueue salute atque incolumitate conservanda. Germani cujusdam nobilis & patriae amantis viri commonefactio
